original_title: Adieu monde ou l'histoire de Pierre et Claire
overview: Short film about the fable of a young shepherd who had disappeared and the girl who followed him in the forest, told by French villagers in the Pyrenees. Each version told reveals the universal fascination of the novel and the unattainable. This film plays with the taste that some tourists have in searching for legends in mythical places, criticizing the authenticity of the facts as they are being told.
title: Adieu monde ou l'histoire de Pierre et Claire
